      • onChanged

        public void onChanged(WheelView wheel,
                      int oldValue,
                      int newValue)
        从接口复制的说明: OnWheelChangedListener
        Callback method to be invoked when current item changed
        指定者:
        onChanged 在接口中 OnWheelChangedListener
        参数:
        wheel - the wheel view whose state has changed
        oldValue - the old value of current item
        newValue - the new value of current item
